response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $11,000, which I believe is a fair and attractive price considering its worth to you stands at $12,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 11000}
